query: SELECT TABLE_NAME, COLUMN_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA=DATABASE() AND COLUMN_NAME REGEXP '^[a-z]+[A-Z]' ORDER BY TABLE_NAME;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4C7dh5n6yXuaUbo.root --database Un9ncnuBxgCCtamkr3qHdr --execute SELECT TABLE_NAME, COLUMN_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA=DATABASE() AND COLUMN_NAME REGEXP '^[a-z]+[A-Z]' ORDER BY TABLE_NAME;
